fullDescription.intro: Provides the same functionality as the File Reader (please refer to the File Reader's page). Additionally this reader's dialog has a tab where you can enter additional files that will be read after the file in the dialog's "main" location. The dialog only looks at its "main" file and determines the settings from it - all other additional files must be readable with these settings.
fullDescription.option: If you enter a variable name here, the file name will be pushed on KNIME's variable stack, for successor nodes in the loop to read. If left empty, the name is not stored on the variable stack.

Enter in each line the name of an additional file to read with the same settings entered in the main dialog page. Absolute paths must start with a '/', '\', or 'X:'. Relative paths are relative to their predecessor file.

ports.dataOut: Datatable just read from the file
